Exclusive Offer

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”CTA Section Title” _builder_version=”3.15″ text_font=”||||” header_font=”Oswald|on||on|” header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”60px” header_line_height=”1.3em” background_layout=”dark” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”|||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”20%” locked=”off”]

Destination Denali
6 Days/5 Nights

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#ffffff” divider_position=”center” divider_weight=”3px” height=”false” disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”3.2″ max_width=”150px” module_alignment=”center” animation_style=”zoom” animation_delay=”200ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”20%” locked=”off”]
[/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section bb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Packages” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” _builder_version=”3.9″ custom_padding=”39px||29px||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”0px||0px|” prev_background_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.5)” next_background_color=”#000000″][et_pb_row admin_label=”Packages Title” custom_padding=”30px|0px|53px|0px|false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”60px||0px|” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” _builder_version=”3.0.76″ locked=”off”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.9″ text_font=”||||” text_text_color=”#1a1a1a” header_font=”Oswald|on||on|” header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”60px” header_line_height=”1.3em” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”|||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”top” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” locked=”off”]

Itinerary

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#ed4441″ divider_position=”center” divider_weight=”3px” height=”false” disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”3.2″ max_width=”150px” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”30px|||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”top” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” locked=”off”]
[/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row admin_label=”Package” custom_padding=”27px|0px|0|0px|false|false” _builder_version=”3.0.67″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.15″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%”]

Day 1: Arrival

Fly into Anchorage, Alaska’s largest city. Transfer to hotel and overnight in downtown Anchorage.

 

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_image src=”https://discover-destinations.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/09/euiaevsmceq.jpg” _builder_version=”3.15″]
[/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row admin_label=”Package” custom_padding=”27px|0px|0|0px|false|false” _builder_version=”3.0.67″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.15″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%”]

Day 2: Denali Park

Guided tour from Anchorage to Denali National Park today on the Parks Highway. Just outside of Anchorage heavy birch forests lead to the spectacular Knik and Matanuska Rivers. Along the route, watch for wildlife. Overnight Denali (B)

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row admin_label=”Package” custom_padding=”27px|0px|0|0px|false|false” _builder_version=”3.0.67″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.15″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%”]

Day 3: Tundra

Today travel deep into Denali National Park on the Tundra Wilderness Tour and search the pristine wilderness for bear, moose, caribou, and Dall sheep. This six to eight-hour journey is narrated allowing for insight into the animals, flora and fauna of this spectacular region including a snack on the bus. Early May & September tours are shortened due to road conditions. Overnight Denali. (B, D)

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row admin_label=”Package” custom_padding=”27px|0px|0|0px|false|false” _builder_version=”3.0.67″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.15″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%”]

Day 4: Mt. McKinley

Enjoy a morning of leisure for on own exploration. This afternoon board the world-famous Alaska Railroad for the day trip to Anchorage. Watch for a glimpse of the majestic Mt. McKinley or black bear along the banks of the Susitna River. Overnight Anchorage (B)

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row admin_label=”Package” custom_padding=”27px|0px|0|0px|false|false” _builder_version=”3.0.67″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″][et_pb_image src=”https://discover-destinations.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/09/er5b_fu2h5a.jpg” _builder_version=”3.15″]
[/et_pb_image][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.15″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%”]

Day 5: Heritage Center

Enjoy a brief city tour of Anchorage, which includes the historic downtown district. Included visit to the Alaska Native Heritage Center, a gathering place that celebrates, perpetuates and shares Alaska Native cultures. Tonight, feast on an Alaskan style dinner and share tales from the road with your traveling companions. Overnight Anchorage. (B, D)

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row admin_label=”Package” custom_padding=”27px|0px|0|0px|false|false” _builder_version=”3.0.67″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.15″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%”]

Day 6: Departure

Your adventure comes to an end with a shuttle to the central cruise line meeting point or airport. (B)

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section bb_built=”1″ admin_label=”More Places” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” _builder_version=”3.0.76″ custom_padding=”0||33px||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”80px||80px|” locked=”off” prev_background_color=”#000000″ global_module=”117″][et_pb_row global_parent=”117″ custom_padding=”16px|0px|27px|0px|false|false” _builder_version=”3.0.69″ locked=”off”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″][et_pb_divider global_parent=”117″ color=”#ed4441″ divider_position=”center” divider_weight=”3px” height=”false” disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”3.9″ max_width=”150px” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”30px|||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”top” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” locked=”off” /][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row global_parent=”117″ _builder_version=”3.7″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″][et_pb_text global_parent=”117″ _builder_version=”3.12.2″]

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text global_parent=”117″ _builder_version=”3.12.2″]

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
